Getting Starting¶

Introduction¶

r6sapi.py is a module for easily getting information from the unofficial rainbow six siege api. It allows you to get things such as a players rank and specific stats for operators, gamemodes and queues The api requires authentication to process any api requests, so r6sapi requires your ubisoft login email and password.

Quick Example¶

import asyncio
import r6sapi as api

@asyncio.coroutine
def run():
    auth = api.Auth("email", "password")

    player = yield from auth.get_player("billy_yoyo", api.Platforms.UPLAY)
    operator = yield from player.get_operator("sledge")

    print(operator.kills)

asyncio.get_event_loop().run_until_complete(run())
